extendedInfo.description: You just found the best Cannabis app available!Accurate, classy, refined, media rich, and easy to use.  Tablet friendly!NOTE: You will need LOTS of free space to install the app.  This is because the content is available even when you have no connection-  ie airplane mode, a tunnel, off the grid, etc.  Sorry, this is not a Web App!::: Features :::* Exclusive Grow Guide  Â» In depth with a high tech emphasis  Â» All topics covered to grow A+ quality  Â» Example grow diary  Â» Exclusive high grade nutrient charts  Â» Pest/disease control including organic* Strain Guide (DNA)   Â» Heritage, description  Â» Growing notes  Â» Multi-touch Pinch Zoom  Â» Shake for random  Â» Sort by name, flowering time, THC, or CBD  Â» Filter by Indica, Sativa, Mixed, or Auto  Â» 225 types w/ more on the way* Alchemy Guide  Â» Science: Studies, Diseases, and Health  Â» Culinary + medicinal recipes:    Â» Cooking oil, butter, soy milk, more.    Â» Hash, bubble hash, hash oil.    Â» Tinctures including non-alcoholic...            All recipes have been tested.  Â» Vaporizing/smoking/dabbing info.  Â» Vaporizer reviews.* Visual Plant RX Gallery  Â» Diagnose common plant disorders easily by photo.* Legal status maps  Â» Worldwide, Europe, and USA   Â» Updated with current laws  Â» RSS feeds for news updates* History Timeline  Â» History of Cannabis Hemp w/ pics.::: ::: :::Visually Rich and Informative.No ads.  Tablet friendly.Works on ANY Android 1.5 - 4.2 device!   Â» More info  [ http://bit.ly/cpr23 ]Trouble w/ install, download, or other?Suggestions, feedback, or issues?   Â» Support/FAQ  [ http://bit.ly/cprhelp ]REFUNDS:***  If the app won't work on your phone or you don't like it we'll refund your money. Please ask within 24 hours.  ***We work hard to make this the finest 420 related app available.  For legal use only!With our exclusive grower guide, learn ganja herb botany or gardening, from clone, or seeds for the home, farm or garden for medicinal use.Learn about safe and effective MMJ bud use as smoke, vapor, joint, bong, concentrate or edible and how it relates to your health including cited research on diseases.  Includes info on Rick Simpson oil, and popular types such as girl scout cookies, OG kush, purple, and haze.  No longer confined to a dank basement, or the stereotype of a stoner with a weed, or a leaf tycoon, it's high time that pot knowledge, which is really hemp knowledge, envelopes the Earth!

reviews.title: Awsome app
reviews.comment: Very informative. I like the history of weed and all the things you can do with just one plant
reviews.author: John Dexter

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: It\'s totally wort the price
reviews.author: Eric Rosenberg

reviews.title: Could earn all 5 stars but. . .
reviews.comment: The strain guide needs updating more often. Old strains that should have been on are just being added while new ones fall to the wayside. Seems everyday something new is out and this does not have any information on it. The legal part seems up to date. A better grow section and maybe calender could be added. Other than that it has been a good app. Very informative.
reviews.author: Jay Havay

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: Nice pictures of problems, fairly detailed information, history part could maybe be longer they\'re quite a few years missing. Overall could be better but I think it will with time
reviews.author: Lanny Ross

reviews.title: Absurdly overpriced
reviews.comment: Only 200 strains and very limited info... What a waste of money......  So many free apps that are so much better!!!
reviews.author: Felipe Franco

reviews.title: Crap since new update
reviews.comment: Apps get ruined by updates all the time and this is one of them. Its a shame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: would be nice if you could show where you can get cuttings or starts instead of having to look through every collective\tthat being said  very good information contained
reviews.author: Ted Hillyer

reviews.title: Can be great again
reviews.comment: Just keep the updates coming!
reviews.author: Raven Swope

reviews.comment: Concise and handy
reviews.author: Dagoberto Coria

reviews.title: Great & informative
reviews.comment: Great detailed app, a treasure trove of information!  Author is thorough & responsive- a modern day Ed Rosenthal. Best on net!

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Not enough strains..most the info is BS. Can\'t believe I paid for this sh*t..
reviews.author: chris d

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love making sure I\'m getting what I\'m told I\'m getting strain guide is great alchemy is great grow guide is great best stoner app on the market
reviews.author: Shane Kreiser

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: I like this app. It is easy to use very user friendly. But there are so many very amazing and very popular strains missing. I don\'t know who runs this app but they need to get a person doing updates more often. I know of possibly 50+ strains that should b on this list that are not and other less popular and not as potient strains are. Make no sense but if they need help contact me ill upload 10+ a day for them. Other then this it really is a great app and source of info.
reviews.author: bobby jenks

reviews.title: Sick app...
reviews.comment: Much info... definitely a steal. Recommend to all.
reviews.author: Michael DeGraff

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Best cannabis app on here :-)
reviews.author: Chloe Powell-hughes

reviews.comment: Great app.
reviews.author: Pete F

reviews.title: Nice app, great way to never get peeled with pretendo
reviews.comment: Bomb app worth the $.
reviews.author: jason fowler

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Very poor, Visual references are poorly described, no treatment methods offered for the most part. Nothing on nutrient deficiencies and strain guide sucks.
reviews.author: Benjamin Higginson

reviews.title: Buy it!
reviews.comment: Its actually a pretty good app. Strains, history, recipes. Your marajuana handbook.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Great app and quick response to E-mails!
reviews.author: A Google User
